item.title: 尽管困境加剧，美国高收益率利差依然紧缩
item.description: 美国高收益债券的利差（即公司相对于美国国债的溢价）仍然很窄，尽管该资产类别中的困境有所加剧，因为投资者认为大多数发行人都将经受更高更长期利率的考验。【原文：Spreads on U.S. high yield bonds, or the premium companies pay over U.S. Treasuries, remain tight despite a pick-up in distress within the asset class, as investors see the majority of issuers weathering higher-for-longer interest rates.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，嘉能可正在研究英美资源集团的收购方案
item.description: 两位消息人士称，大宗商品集团嘉能可正在研究收购英美资源集团（Anglo American），这一进展可能引发对这家拥有107年历史的矿业公司的竞购战。【原文：Commodities group Glencore is studying an approach for Anglo American , two sources said, a development that could spark a bidding war for the 107-year old mining company.】

item.title: Rivian 公司获得 8.27 亿美元的一揽子激励措施，以扩建伊利诺伊州的工厂
item.description: Rivian Automotive 周四表示，该公司已从伊利诺伊州获得 8.27 亿美元的奖励，用于扩大其在伊利诺伊州正常工厂的运营。【原文：Rivian Automotive said on Thursday it has received $827 million in incentives from the State of Illinois to expand operations at its Normal facility in the state.】

item.title: FCC 称许多美国电信公司需要更多资金更换华为和中兴设备
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会（FCC）周四表示，近 40% 的美国电信公司需要政府提供额外资金，以便从美国无线网络中移除中国电信企业华为和中兴通讯生产的设备，以应对安全风险。【原文：The Federal Communications Commission (FCC) said on Thursday nearly 40% of U.S. telecom companies need additional government funding to remove equipment made by Chinese telecoms firms Huawei and ZTE from American wireless networks to address security risks.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦推迟就收购国家航空公司提交意向书的截止日期
item.description: 巴基斯坦私有化部长周四表示，巴基斯坦将把企业表达收购国家航空公司巴基斯坦国际航空公司意向的截止日期推迟到 5 月 18 日。【原文：Pakistan will push back the deadline for companies to express interest in buying national carrier Pakistan International Airlines to May 18, the country's privatisation minister said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国生产率疲软可能威胁美联储的 "软着陆 "希望
item.description: 美国第一季度生产率增幅疲软，这可能会对美联储在失业率不出现令人痛苦的上升的情况下完成通胀斗争的努力构成挑战，如果经济进一步放缓，物价方面的进展可能会停滞不前。【原文：Weaker U.S. productivity gains in the first quarter may challenge the Federal Reserve's efforts to finish its inflation fight without a painful rise in unemployment, potentially stalling progress on prices absent a further economic slowdown.】

item.title: 环球音乐集团第一季度核心盈利超出预期
item.description: 环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group）周四公布的第一季度调整后核心利润超出预期，这得益于旗下明星泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）的成功。【原文：Universal Music Group on Thursday posted first-quarter adjusted core profit that beat expectations, helped by the success of its star Taylor Swift.】

item.title: 波音供应商精神航空系统公司起诉阻止得克萨斯州安全调查
item.description: 航空零部件制造商 Spirit AeroSystems 要求美国法官阻止得克萨斯州总检察长肯-帕克斯顿（Ken Paxton）的调查，称该州要求提供内部文件和其他信息是不合理和不合法的。【原文：Airline parts manufacturer Spirit AeroSystems has asked a U.S. judge to block a probe by Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton, calling the state's demand for internal documents and other information unreasonable and unlawful.】

item.title: 商用飞机和汽车拉动美国工厂订单增长
item.description: 受商用飞机和汽车需求的拉动，3 月份美国制成品的新订单稳健增长，但其他方面的增幅不大。【原文：New orders for U.S.-manufactured goods increased solidly in March, boosted by demand for commercial aircraft and motor vehicles, but gains elsewhere were moderate.】

item.title: 消息人士称，高盛取消了欧盟规定的英国顶级银行家奖金上限
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的消息人士透露，在英国取消了从欧盟继承下来的这一政策数月之后，高盛（Goldman Sachs）已经取消了其在英国的顶级银行家的奖金上限。【原文：Goldman Sachs has removed the cap on bonuses for its top bankers in the UK, according to a source familiar with the matter, months after the country axed the policy it had inherited from the European Union.】

item.title: 美国律师事务所 Mayer Brown 将与香港合伙企业分道扬镳
item.description: 美国律师事务所 Mayer Brown 周四表示，随着许多国际律师事务所重新考虑或减少在中国的业务，该公司计划脱离目前在香港的业务。【原文：U.S. law firm Mayer Brown said on Thursday that it plans to separate from its current Hong Kong operations, as many international law firms rethink or reduce their presence in China.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，TOMS Capital 投资管理公司已入股 Kellanova 公司
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士周四透露，投资公司 TOMS Capital Investment Management 已在美国跨国食品制造公司 Kellanova 持有 "大量 "头寸，并正在与该公司接触。【原文：Investment firm TOMS Capital Investment Management has taken a "significant" position in U.S. multinational food manufacturing company Kellanova and is engaging with the company, two sources familiar with the matter said on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家报道：美国官员称俄罗斯向朝鲜运送石油的数量高于联合国规定水平
item.description: 一位美国官员周四表示，俄罗斯一直在悄悄地向朝鲜运送精炼石油，其数量似乎违反了联合国安理会的授权，并补充说美国正计划对此实施新的制裁。【原文：Russia has been quietly shipping refined petroleum to North Korea at levels that appear to violate the mandates of the United Nations Security Council, a U.S. official said on Thursday, adding the U.S. is planning new sanctions in response.】

item.title: 壳牌首席执行官称目前不考虑在纽约重新上市
item.description: 壳牌公司首席执行官 Wael Sawan 周四表示，壳牌目前并不积极考虑在纽约重新上市，而是专注于股票回购。【原文：Shell is not actively looking at relisting in New York at the moment, and is focused on share repurchases, CEO Wael Sawan said on Thursday.】

item.title: Pinnacle West Capital 因客户增长和新费率而实现第一季度盈利
item.description: Pinnacle West Capital Corp 周四公布，由于客户增长、销售额增加和新费率的提高，该公司一季度实现盈利，而去年同期则出现亏损。【原文：Pinnacle West Capital Corp posted a quarterly profit from year-ago loss on Thursday, on the back of customer growth, increased sales and new rates.】

item.title: 加拿大央行称美加利率差异有限
item.description: 加拿大央行行长蒂夫-马克莱姆（Tiff Macklem）周四在下议院金融委员会上表示，美国和加拿大的利率差异是有限度的，但 "我们肯定还没有接近这个限度"。【原文：There is a limit to how far U.S. and Canadian interest rates can diverge but "certainly we're not close to that limit", Bank of Canada Governor Tiff Macklem told the House of Commons finance committee on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国三月份贸易逆差略有收窄
item.description: 美国 3 月份的贸易赤字略有收窄，原因是出口的大幅下滑在一定程度上缓解了进口的下降。【原文：The U.S. trade deficit narrowed slightly in March as a decline in imports was tempered somewhat by a plunge in exports.】

item.title: 美国第一季度生产率大幅放缓
item.description: 第一季度，美国工人生产率的增长大幅放缓，导致劳动力成本飙升，但生产率的趋势依然稳健。【原文：U.S. worker productivity growth slowed sharply in the first quarter, resulting in a surge in labor costs, but the trend in productivity remained solid.】

item.title: 凯拉诺瓦第一季度业绩喜人，需求保持稳定
item.description: 受谷物早餐和即食零食价格上涨和需求坚挺的推动，Pop-Tarts 生产商凯兰诺瓦公司周四公布的第一季度销售额和利润超出华尔街预期。【原文：Pop-Tarts maker Kellanova beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter sales and profit on Thursday, boosted by higher prices and firm demand for its breakfast cereals and ready-to-eat snacks.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会下令禁止埃克森美孚与先锋自然资源公司的交易
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会周四表示，在解决埃克森美孚收购这家顶级页岩油生产商的反垄断问题时，该委员会阻止先锋自然资源公司前首席执行官斯科特-谢菲尔德（Scott Sheffield）进入埃克森美孚董事会。【原文：The Federal Trade Commission said on Thursday it prevented former Pioneer Natural Resources CEO Scott Sheffield from serving on Exxon Mobil's board of directors as it resolves antitrust concerns about Exxon's bid to buy the top shale oil producer.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数不变；4 月份裁员人数下降
item.description: 由于劳动力市场仍然相当紧张，上周新申请失业救济的美国人数量稳定在较低水平。【原文：The number of Americans filing new claims for unemployment benefits held steady at lower levels last week as the labor market remains fairly tight.】

item.title: 产品需求强劲，穆迪公司季度利润超预期
item.description: 受研究和分析产品需求的推动，穆迪公司周四公布的第一季度利润超出华尔街预期。【原文：Moody's on Thursday beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter profit, helped by demand for its research and analytics products.】

item.title: 军用造船厂亨廷顿第一季度业绩超出预期，原因是航母需求旺盛
item.description: 亨廷顿-英格尔斯公司（Huntington Ingalls）周四公布的季度财报显示，在地缘政治局势高度紧张的背景下，该公司对航空母舰、两栖攻击舰和潜艇的需求好于预期。【原文：Huntington Ingalls reported a better-than-expected quarterly earnings on Thursday, on the back of demand for aircraft carriers, amphibious assault ships and submarines amid high geopolitical tension.】

item.title: 马达加斯加一次性亏损导致日本住友商事净利润下降 32
item.description: 日本贸易公司住友商事（Sumitomo Corp）报告称，由于四项业务出现一次性亏损，截至 3 月份的本财年净利润同比下降 31.7%，降至 3864 亿日元（约合 25 亿美元），低于预期。【原文：Japanese trading house Sumitomo Corp reported net profit for the fiscal year ended in March fell 31.7% from a year earlier to 386.4 billion yen ($2.5 billion), missing estimates, as it took a one-time loss on four businesses.】

item.title: 膝关节和髋关节器械需求强劲，Zimmer Biomet 第一季度利润超出预期
item.description: 医疗技术公司 Zimmer Biomet Holdings 周四公布的第一季度利润超过了华尔街预期，原因是市场对其用于膝关节和髋关节重建手术的设备需求强劲。【原文：Medtech firm Zimmer Biomet Holdings beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter profit on Thursday, on the back of robust demand for its devices that are used in knee and hip reconstruction procedures.】

item.title: 纽交所母公司 ICE 的利润因能源市场波动性创纪录地激增而上升
item.description: 洲际交易所（Intercontental Exchange）周四公布，由于能源市场交易量激增，创下历史新高，第一季度调整后利润有所增长。【原文：Intercontinental Exchange reported a rise in adjusted profit for the first quarter on Thursday as volumes hit a record on surge in energy markets trading.】

item.title: 人工智能引发中国智能手机市场反弹，高通公司股价大涨
item.description: 高通公司（Qualcomm）股价周四在盘前交易中上涨 4%，这家专注于智能手机的芯片制造商在经历了两年的低迷之后，发出了人工智能推动需求反弹的信号，尤其是在中国。【原文：Qualcomm shares rose 4% in premarket trading on Thursday after the smartphone-focused chipmaker signaled an AI-fueled rebound in demand, especially in China, after a two-year slump.】

item.title: 尼日利亚法院将 Binance 及高管的审判延期至 5 月 17 日
item.description: 尼日利亚一家法院周四将针对加密货币交易所 Binance 及其两名高管的洗钱审判延期至 5 月 17 日，因为该交易所的一名律师称，他尚未收到准备案件所需的文件。【原文：A Nigerian court on Thursday adjourned a money laundering trial against cryptocurrency exchange Binance and two of its executives to May 17 after a lawyer for the exchange said he had not been served with documents needed to prepare for the case.】

item.title: Peloton 首席执行官卸任
item.description: 联网健身公司 Peloton Interactive 周四表示，巴里-麦卡锡（Barry McCarthy）已辞去首席执行官一职。【原文：Connected-fitness company Peloton Interactive said on Thursday Barry McCarthy has stepped down as CEO.】

item.title: 康菲石油公司季度利润不及预期
item.description: 由于需求担忧导致天然气价格大幅下跌，美国石油和天然气生产商康菲石油公司（ConocoPhillips）周四公布的第一季度利润不及华尔街预期。【原文：U.S. oil and gas producer ConocoPhillips missed Wall Street estimates for first-quarter profit on Thursday, as demand concerns led to a sharp fall in natural gas prices.】
